alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 02 at 8:29AM HST until April 03 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .Periods of snow will develop this afternoon through late tonight. The heaviest snow will fall above 12000 feet while a mix of rain and snow is expected as low as 10500 feet. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up 5 inches. Southeast winds gusting up to 35 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
